Ability.Name: USE: Gloves
Ability.Lua: if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",10) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(10) end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 1
Ability.Lua:
local levelCheck = UnitLevel("target")
if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 and UnitAffectingCombat("target") == true and UnitHealth("target") < 70000 then UseInventoryItem(13) end
if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 and UnitAffectingCombat("target") == true and UnitBuffID("player", 3045) ~= nil then UseInventoryItem(13) end
if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 and UnitAffectingCombat("target") == true and levelCheck == -1 then UseInventoryItem(13) end

Ability.Name: USE: Trinket 2
Ability.Lua: if GetInventoryItemCooldown("player",13) == 0 then UseInventoryItem(13) end

Ability.Name: --- defensive spells ---
Ability.Lua:
if modkeytime == nil then modkeytime = 0 end if IsRightControlKeyDown() and GetTime() - modkeytime > 1 then modkeytime = GetTime() if modkeystate then modkeystate = nil print("Rotation mode: \124cFFDBFA2ASingle target") else modkeystate = 1 print("Rotation mode: \124cFFFA652AArea of Effect") end end
if IsLeftControlKeyDown() or IsMounted() or SpellIsTargeting() or UnitBuffID("player",58984) or UnitBuffID("player",5384) or UnitBuffID("player",51755) then return true end

Ability.Name: --- offensive spells ---
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 642, 45438, 31224, 23920, 33786, 19263, 97417, 97977 } local mob = { "Training Dummy", "Raider's Training Dummy", "Twisted Spirit", "AmaniÂ´shi Hatcher", "Hakkar's Chains", "Exposed Head of Magmaw", "Battleground Demolisher", "Ozumat", "Right Foot", "Left Foot" } local noaggromobs = nil local immunity = nil
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitBuffID("target",v) then immunity = 1 end end
for i,v in ipairs(mob) do if UnitName("target") == v then noaggromobs = 1 end end
if immunity then return true end

Ability.Name: Aspect of the Hawk
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 13165) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Aimed Shot Proc
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", "82926") and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() == False then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(82928))) return true end

Ability.Name: Mend Pet
Ability.Lua: if UnitExists("pet") and UnitIsDead("pet") == nil and PQR_IsOutOfSight("pet") == false and 100 * UnitHealth("pet") / UnitHealthMax("pet") < 80 and UnitBuffID("pet",136) == nil --and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Misdirection
Ability.Lua:
if UnitCanAttack("player","target") and UnitIsDead("target") == nil and UnitHealth("target") > UnitHealthMax("player") and UnitName("target") ~= "Raider's Training Dummy" and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then
local havetank = nil local InParty = GetNumPartyMembers() if InParty > 0 then for i = 1, InParty, 1 do local member = "party"..tostring(i) if UnitGroupRolesAssigned(member) == "TANK" and UnitIsDead(member) == nil then if UnitThreatSituation(member,"target") ~= 3 and UnitInRange(member) then CastSpellByID(34477,member) end havetank = 1 end end end if havetank == nil and UnitExists("pet") and UnitThreatSituation("pet","target") ~= 3 then return true end
end

Ability.Name: Scatter Shot
Hunter's Mark
Ability.Lua: if UnitCanAttack("player","target") and modkeystate == nil and UnitIsDead("target") == nil --and UnitAffectingCombat("player") == nil and UnitHealth("target") > UnitHealthMax("player") and UnitDebuffID("target",1130) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Assist Tank
Ability.Lua:
if GetNumPartyMembers() > 0 and UnitInRaid("player") == nil then
local heisthetank = nil
for i = 1, GetNumPartyMembers(), 1 do if UnitGroupRolesAssigned("party"..tostring(i)) == "TANK" then heisthetank = "party"..tostring(i) end end
if heisthetank and UnitExists("target") == nil and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank) and UnitAffectingCombat(heisthetank.."target") and UnitIsDead(heisthetank.."target") == nil and UnitCanAttack("player",heisthetank.."target") then TargetUnit(heisthetank.."target") end
end

Ability.Name: Tranquilizing Shot
Ability.Lua:
buff = { 99646 } local candispel = 1
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID("target",v) then candispel = nil end end
local i = 1 local buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) while buff do if (bufftype == "Magic" or buff == "Enrage") and candispel then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) end

Ability.Name: Kill Shot
Ability.Lua: if 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") <= 20 then return true end

Ability.Name: Serpent Sting
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 1978) == nil and modkeystate == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Raptor Strike
Ability.Lua: if IsSpellInRange(tostring(GetSpellInfo(56641))) == 0 then return true end

Ability.Name: Rapid Fire
Ability.Lua: local levelCheck = UnitLevel("target") if UnitBuffID("player", "3045") == nil and levelCheck == -1 and select(7,GetSpellInfo(19434)) > 1800 then return true end

Ability.Name: Readiness
Ability.Lua: local levelCheck = UnitLevel("target") if levelCheck == -1 and UnitBuffID("player", 3045) ~= nil --and select(2,GetSpellCooldown(3045)) > 90 then return true end

Ability.Name: Steady Shot
Ability.Lua:
if UnitPower("player") < 42 then reloadphase = 1 end if UnitPower("player") > 55 then reloadphase = nil end
if GetUnitSpeed("Player") > 0 and UnitBuffID("player", 82661) == nil and UnitPower("player") < 40 then CastSpellByID(82661) end
if reloadphase then return true end

Ability.Name: Aimed Shot
Ability.Lua:
local unitHp = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") _,_,_,_,_,_,casttime = GetSpellInfo(19434)
if GetUnitSpeed("Player") > 0 and modkeystate == nil and (casttime < 1800 or unitHp >= 90) and UnitCastingInfo("player") ~= GetSpellInfo(19434) and UnitPower("player") < 90 and UnitDebuffID("target", 1978) and tostring(select(7,UnitDebuffID("target", 1978))) - GetTime() > 7 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(19434))) return true end

Ability.Name: Chimera Shot
Ability.Lua: if modkeystate == nil and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() == False then return true end

Ability.Name: Arcane Shot
Ability.Lua: if modkeystate == nil and UnitBuffID("player", 56453) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Multi-Shot
Ability.Lua: if modkeystate then return true end

Ability.Name: FD
Ability.Lua: if UnitThreatSituation("player") == 3 and PQR_IsMoving(1) == false then return true end

Ability.Name: Aimed Shot 2
Ability.Lua:
local unitHp = 100 * UnitHealth("target") / UnitHealthMax("target") _,_,_,_,_,_,casttime = GetSpellInfo(19434)
if UnitBuffID("player", "82926") then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(82928))) return true end
if PQR_IsMoving(1) == false and modkeystate == nil and UnitPower("player") < 90 then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(19434))) return true end

Ability.Name: CS
Ability.Lua: return true

Ability.Name: Aspect of the Fox
Ability.Lua:
local FoxBuff = UnitBuffID("player", 82661)
if GetUnitSpeed("Player") > 0 and UnitPower("player") < 50 and FoxBuff == nil and UnitExists("target") then return true end

Ability.Name: Camouflage
Ability.Lua:
local buff = { 55078, 55095,770,16857, 339,1822,8921,5570,5221,1079,1978,44614,589,2944,34914,348,980,172,30108,703,1943,89775 } local havebuff = 1
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID("player",v) then havebuff = nil end end
if havebuff then return true end

Ability.Name: Concussive Shot
Ability.Lua:
local levelCheck = UnitLevel("target")
if levelCheck == -1 then --boss level is -1... do not cast this on a boss. return false end
if UnitName("target") ~= nil then bHoF = UnitBuffID("target", 1044) --Hand of Freedom if bHoF == nil then bHoF = UnitBuffID("target", 53271) --Master's Call end bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 1715) --Hamstring if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 45524) --Chains of Ice end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 16979) --Feral Charge end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 2974) --Wing Clip end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 13809) --Frost Trap... end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 5116) --Conc Shot end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 116) --Frostbolt end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 120) --Cone of Cold end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 11113) --Blast Wave end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 31589) --Slow end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 15407) --Mind Flay end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 3408) --Crippling Poison end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 26679) --Deadly Throw end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 8056) --Frost Shock end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 3600) --Earthbind end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 18223) --Curse of Exhaustion end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 12323) --Piercing Howl end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 45524) --Chains of Ice end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 68766) --Desecration end if bSlow == nil then bSlow = UnitDebuffID("target", 50435) --Chilblains end if bHoF == nil and bSlow == nil then return true end end

Ability.Name: Ice Trap
Ability.Lua: if IsRightAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(13809))) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Explosive Trap
Ability.Lua: if IsRightAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(13813))) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Snake Trap
Ability.Lua: if IsRightAltKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(34600))) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Aimed Shot Camouflage
Ability.Lua: if GetUnitSpeed("Player") > 0 and IsLeftControlKeyDown() == false and UnitBuffID("player", "51755") then return false elseif UnitBuffID("player", "51755") then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(19434))) return true end

Ability.Name: FreezingTrap
Ability.Lua: if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and GetCurrentKeyBoardFocus() == nil then CastSpellByName(tostring(GetSpellInfo(1499))) if SpellIsTargeting() then CameraOrSelectOrMoveStart() CameraOrSelectOrMoveStop() end return true end

Ability.Name: Traplauncher
Ability.Lua: if IsRightAltKeyDown() and UnitBuffID("player", 77769) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Tranquilizing Shot w/o Magic
Ability.Lua:
buff = { 99646 } local candispel = 1
for i,v in ipairs(buff) do if UnitDebuffID("target",v) then candispel = nil end end
local i = 1 local buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) while buff do if (bufftype == "Enrage") and candispel then return true end i = i + 1; buff,_,_,_,bufftype = UnitBuff("target", i) end
if UnitBuffID("target",1022) then return true end if UnitBuffID("target",1044) then return true end if UnitBuffID("target",53271) then return true end

Ability.Name: Traplauncher2
Ability.Lua: if IsRightShiftKeyDown() and UnitBuffID("player", 77769) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Serpent Sting PVP
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 1978) == nil and modkeystate == nil and UnitHealth("target") > 50000 then return true end

Ability.Name: HuntersMark
Ability.Lua: local hmDebuff = UnitAura("target", "Hunter's Mark", nil, "PLAYER|HARMFUL") local class = select(2, UnitClass("target")) if hmDebuff == nil and class == "ROGUE" then return true end

Ability.Name: SV: Serpent Sting
Ability.Lua: if UnitDebuffID("target", 1978) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Explosive Shot
Ability.Lua: if modkeystate == nil and UnitDebuffID("target",53301) == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Black Arrow
Ability.Lua: local BAdebuff = UnitDebuffID("target", 3674) if modkeystate == nil and BAdebuff == nil then return true end

Ability.Name: Cobra Shot
Ability.Lua:
if UnitPower("player") < 42 then reloadphase = 1 end if UnitPower("player") > 55 then reloadphase = nil end
if GetUnitSpeed("Player") > 0 and UnitBuffID("player", 82661) == nil and UnitPower("player") < 40 then CastSpellByID(77767) end
if reloadphase then return true end

Ability.Name: Aspect of the Fox z
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", 82661) == nil and PQR_IsMoving(1) == true then return true end

Ability.Name: defpause
Arcane Shot Stop
Ability.Lua: if UnitBuffID("player", "82926") and IsLeftShiftKeyDown() == true then return true end

Ability.Name: MS Effect
Ability.Lua: if modkeystate == nil and UnitDebuffID("target",82654) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target",12294) == nil and UnitDebuffID("target",13218 ) == nil then return true end
